summary: Implements a customizable guardrail component for the Litellm proxy that provides asynchronous hooks to moderate requests, validate inputs before calls, and handle successful responses after calls, enabling developers to embed policy and safety checks around LLM service invocations.
business_intent: Offer a flexible integration point for organizations to enforce compliance, safety, and custom business rules on LLM API usage within the Litellm platform, reducing risk and ensuring adherence to internal or regulatory standards.
